manifest.name: Zoottelkeeper Plugin
manifest.description: This plugin automatically creates, maintains and tags MOCs for all your folders.
manifest.author: Akos Balasko, Micha Brugger

data.manifestValue: This plugin automatically creates, maintains and tags MOCs for all your folders.
data.communityListValue: It maintains index files in all of your folders in your vault: if you create/delete/move a note, the index files will be updated automatically. It can be used to show folders in Graph View.
